## Section Reference
Which section of SPEC.md is ambiguous?

Example: "Section 5.1 - Decay Function"

## The Ambiguity
Describe the unclear language or behavior in detail.

## Why It Matters
What could two implementations interpret differently?

How would this ambiguity cause problems?

## Suggested Clarification
(Optional) How would you rewrite the section to be clearer?

## Implementation Impact
Have you encountered this ambiguity while building an implementation?
